fields.name: KeyVaultUri
fields.description: They key vault secret uri to obtain the target storage SAS token.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of target for the export pipeline.

fields.name: Uri
fields.description:
The target uri of the export pipeline.
When 'AzureStorageBlob': "https://accountName.blob.core.windows.net/containerName/blobName"
When 'AzureStorageBlobContainer':  "https://accountName.blob.core.windows.net/containerName"
